short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Amazon shopping experience with influencer video insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrumball Lite is a powerful Chrome plugin designed specifically for Amazon merchants. By showcasing relevant influencer video content, it aims to elevate the user shopping experience and drive traffic. The plugin supports major platforms like YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram, allowing users to enjoy its features for free, with the option to unlock more capabilities through a simple login process.
Key Features
- Automatic Influencer Recommendations: On any Amazon product page, the plugin automatically recommends three influencers who have promoted similar products.
- Comprehensive Influencer Search: Users can perform influencer searches for any Amazon product, with AI-powered recommendations ensuring the best matches.
- Extensive Free Influencer Database: Logged-in users gain access to a database of 500 influencers who are skilled in product promotion, available at no cost.
- Affordable Annual Subscription: For just $49.9 per year, users can unlock premium features and gain enhanced functionality.
